016package app.supernaut.fx.micronaut;
017
018import app.supernaut.fx.FxmlLoaderFactory;
019import io.micronaut.context.BeanContext;
020import javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader;
021
022import jakarta.inject.Singleton;
023import java.net.URL;
024
025/**
026 * Factory for providing FXMLLoaders that do full DI. This
027 * singleton is added to the Micronaut BeanContext with BeanContext#registerSingleton.
028 */
029@Singleton
030public class MicronautFxmlLoaderFactory implements FxmlLoaderFactory {
031    BeanContext context;
032
033    /**
034     * Constructor that gets BeanContext of the SupernautFX application injected.
035     *
036     * @param context The BeanContext of the SupernautFX application
037     */
038    public MicronautFxmlLoaderFactory(BeanContext context) {
039        this.context = context;
040    }
041
042    /**
043     * Get the FXML controller from the BeanContext
044     *
045     * @param clazz The controller class we are looking for
046     * @param <T> The class type of the controller
047     * @return A controller instance
048     */
049    public <T> T getControllerFactory(Class<T> clazz) {
050        return context.getBean(clazz);
051    }
052
053    /**
054     * Get an FXMLLoader without setting a location
055     *
056     * @return An FXMLLoader
057     */
058    public FXMLLoader get() {
059        return get(null);
060    }
061
062    /**
063     * Get an FXMLLoader for the given location
064     *
065     * @param location The location of the FXML resource
066     * @return An FXMLLoader
067     */
068    public FXMLLoader get(URL location) {
069        FXMLLoader loader = new FXMLLoader(location);
070        loader.setControllerFactory(this::getControllerFactory);
071        return loader;
072    }
073
074}
